```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(curl)
library(ggthemes)
```
Set `knitr` and `ggplot2` options.
```{r}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
    cache = FALSE,
    fig.path = "Output/",
    dev = c("png", "pdf"),
    message = FALSE,
    warning = FALSE
    )

theme_set(theme_bw())

theme_update(
  axis.text.x = element_text(
    angle = -45,
    hjust = 0,
    vjust = 0.5
  ),
  axis.text.y = element_text(hjust = 0)
)
```

```{r sessionInfo, results='markup'}
sessionInfo()
```
